references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces Mamba, a novel state-space model that is central to the proposed DiMSUM architecture, providing a foundation for the efficient and scalable image generation method.

references.paper_title: Efficiently modeling long sequences with structured state spaces
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the state-space model (SSM) architecture used in Mamba, a key component of DiMSUM, influencing its design for linear time complexity and efficient long-range dependency modeling.

This highly influential paper introduces the foundational theory of denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), the underlying generative modeling technique that DiMSUM builds upon and enhances for image generation.
This paper explores the use of transformers in diffusion models, a key architectural choice for DiMSUM, showcasing the successful integration of transformers for superior image generation quality.

This paper introduces a flow matching approach within the latent diffusion model framework, a technique adopted and enhanced within the DiMSUM architecture, allowing for improved training efficiency and high-quality image generation.
